channel.title: Flutter on all about apps
channel.description: Recent content in Flutter on all about apps

item.title: Nested navigation with Getx
item.description: Nested navigation is a useful approach when navigation inside a screen is required or when the provided designs requires specific transitions to and from a dialog. This article will cover the basics for nested navigation in Flutter with the Getx framework. Table of Contents Introduction Navigator Arguments State management Bottom navigation Problems Introduction Have you ever had the challenge to navigate on a screen while still showing the BottomNavigationBar or wanted to navigate inside a dialog?
